entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Norfolk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:56 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 3:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -15.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -17.9°C
Wind: WSW 27 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Amount 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 110 diminishing to 50 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Local blowing snow. Amount 15 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
